meanings.definition: A group of power-seeking deities in Hindu mythology.
meanings.sent1: In Hindu stories, the asuras were always trying to gain more power.
meanings.sent2: The asuras in Hindu mythology were known for their desire for power.
meanings.sent3: The asuras decided to have a power-seeking competition to see who could lift the heaviest rock.
meanings.sent4: The asuras' thirst for power was like a never-ending flame burning within them.
meanings.sent5: The image of the asuras striving for power was etched in the minds of the people.

meanings.definition: A demon or evil spirit in Hindu mythology.
meanings.sent1: Legends say that the asuras were evil spirits that haunted the forests.
meanings.sent2: People feared encountering the asuras in the dark corners of the night.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous asuras played pranks on unsuspecting travelers in the woods.
meanings.sent4: The presence of the asuras felt like a chilling breeze on a warm summer night.
meanings.sent5: The tales of the asuras' wicked deeds spread far and wide.
